name: Spawn System
description: Custom spawn manager with configurable spawn points

scripts.description: Custom spawn point manager with selection logic
Component for individual spawn point entities

instructions:
CRITICAL: Use api_search to verify EVERY method you call. Never guess Enfusion API method names — they are non-standard and many obvious-sounding methods don't exist.
1. Use api_search to look up SCR_RespawnSystemComponent, SCR_SpawnPoint, and any other spawn-related classes — verify methods exist before using them
2. Edit SpawnManager to implement spawn point selection logic — only call methods confirmed by api_search
3. Edit SpawnPointComponent to define availability rules
4. Create the spawn point prefab with prefab_create
5. Attach SpawnManager to your game mode prefab
6. Mod the SCR_RespawnSystemComponent to use your custom manager — verify the override method exists first
7. Place spawn point prefabs in the world
8. Test with multiple players connecting and respawning
